The 6,500-square-foot manor house, completed in 1912, sits on a secluded 2\'bd-acre lot in the Paradis neighborhood south of the city\'92s historic core. Planned as a residence for Conrad Mohr\'92s son, Norwegian politician and farmer Wilhelm Mohr (1886 \'96 1978), the property was bought in 1990 by Helge Riis\'f8en, a Norwegian neurologist and crime-novel author, and his wife, Janicke Hetland, a nurse.","credit":"Bent Ren\'e9 Synnev\'e5g for The Wall Street Journal","widths":\{"1260":\{"w":1280,"h":853,"url":"https://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-UV252_NORWAY_M_20170825142945.jpg"\}\}\},\{"slug":"NORWAY_2","caption":"Dr. Riis\'f8en and Ms. Hetland, both in their 60s, have upgraded the home over the decades, furnishing the dining room, shown, with a new chandelier and a new marble fireplace. They have spent about $383,000 on renovations.","credit":"Bent Ren\'e9 Synnev\'e5g for The Wall Street Journal","widths":\{"1260":\{"w":1280,"h":853,"url":"https://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-UV247_NORWAY_M_20170825142945.jpg"\}\}\},\{"slug":"NORWAY_3","caption":"A ground floor sitting room and library retain original elements, like the imported English fireplace and parquet floors.","credit":"Bent Ren\'e9 Synnev\'e5g for The Wall Street Journal","widths":\{"1260":\{"w":1280,"h":853,"url":"https://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-UV248_NORWAY_M_20170825142945.jpg"\}\}\},\{"slug":"NORWAY_4","caption":"The doctor and his wife added bookcases to the room.","credit":"Bent Ren\'e9 Synnev\'e5g for The Wall Street Journal","widths":\{"1260":\{"w":1280,"h":853,"url":"https://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-UV251_NORWAY_M_20170825142945.jpg"\}\}\},\{"slug":"NORWAY_5","caption":"A music room off the sitting room is furnished with a bronze bust, above chair on right, of Dr. Riis\'f8en\'92s grandfather, Norwegian archaeologist Helge Gjessing.","credit":"Bent Ren\'e9 Synnev\'e5g for The Wall Street Journal","widths":\{"1260":\{"w":1280,"h":853,"url":"https://si.wsj.net/public/resources/images/BN-UV250_NORWAY_M_20170825142945.jpg"\}\}\},\{"slug":"NORWAY_6","caption":"The Shah of Iran once sipped coffee in the Mohrs\'92 sitting room.
